docs.title: Welcome to JED-FFM Docs
docs.text: This guide walks you through common operations in the FFM app.

docs.title: Sections
docs.text:
Use the navigation to explore different features and actions within the app.

  • Bill Delivery
  • Getting Started
  • Delivering a Bill
  • Posting Payments
  • Scheduling Disconnections
  • Executing Disconnections
  • Confirming Disconnections
  • Requesting Reconnections
  • Validating a Customer(KYC)
  • Troubleshooting & FAQs

docs.title: Contact & Support
docs.text: For more detail documentation contact support or visit JED Plc Official website.

docs.title: Step 1: Open the FFM App
docs.text:
1. Tap on "Bill Delivery" from the home menu.

  2. Select the customer from the list.

  3. Confirm and submit.

docs.title: 📥 Download the App
docs.text: 🔗 Download for Windows 🔗 Download for Android

docs.title: 🛠 Install the App
docs.text:
WindowsAndroid
  1. Download the installer from the link above.
  2. Run the .exe file and follow the setup instructions.
  3. Open the app from the Start Menu after installation.
  1. Download the APK from the link above.
  2. Open the APK file and tap Install.
  3. If prompted, enable Install from Unknown Sources in settings.
  4. Open the app from your home screen.

docs.title: 📋 Granting Permissions
docs.text:
WindowsAndroid
  • Network Access: Required for syncing data.
  • File Access: Needed for exporting reports.
  • Location: Needed for field tracking.
  • Storage: Required for saving reports.
  • Camera: Needed for scanning codes.
